sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>A weapon with Ensnare binds a foe and restricts his movements. When Ensnare is triggered, the target is immobilized (see page 218) for a number of rounds equal to the weapon's Ensnare rating. An Ensnared target may attempt a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Athletics check as his action on his turn to break free from the effect. An immobilized target cannot perform maneuvers.</description> <name>Ensnare (Active)</name> <number>WQ0001012</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 04:59:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5f9c18242fd46450e0f497eef699b664</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 04:59:07</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
